ModMetaData.name: TurtleShroom Productions Proudly Bee-sents: I CANNOT BEE-LIEVE IT!
ModMetaData.author: TurtleShroom
ModMetaData.description:
[H2]TURTLESHROOM PRODUCTIONS PRESENTS: I CANNOT BEE-LIEVE IT!![/H2]
Based on the world-famous [URL=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1558161673]ALPHA RIM BEES MOD[/URL], this sub-Mod adds [b][I]OVER THIRTY-FIVE NEW BEES[/I][/b]* for you to explore and breed, with support for multiple Mods and items! Experience bees that produce rice, bees that produce water, bees that produce Wake-Up, Bees that produce Go Juice, and so much more!
This Mod contains support for the following Mods, none of which are required: * [URL=https://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2959585309]MAKE HONEY EVEN MORE COMPATIBLE MOD[/URL] (HIGHLY RECOMMENDED) * [URL=https://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2856039567]MANTODEANS MOD[/URL] * [URL=https://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3241577976]VIVI MOD[/URL] * [URL=https://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3219632807]APINI MOD[/URL] * [URL=https://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3090186019]ADAMAS BEE MOD[/URL] * [URL=https://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=766264659]MISCELLANEOUS BEE AND HONEY MOD[/URL] * [URL=https://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3358481320]DIDDY BABY OIL MOD[/URL] * [URL=https://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3282241187]STARCH SEED MOD[/URL] * [URL=https://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3382446150]ALPHA CRAFTS MOD[/URL] * [URL=https://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2134308519]VANILLA FACTIONS EXPANDED COOKING MOD[/URL] * [URL=https://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3426421043]ARK RACE MOD[/URL] * [URL=https://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2830700043]MEGABEE MOD[/URL] * [URL=https://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836308268]DUBS BAD HYGIENE MOD[/URL] * [URL=https://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3382446150]ALPHA ANIMALS MOD[/URL] * [URL=https://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3364925204]TERMINATOR MOD[/URL] * [URL=https://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3352425123]SOYLENT GREEN IS PAWNS!![/URL] * [URL=https://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3075384838]ANCIENT HYDROPONIC FARMS MOD[/URL]
[B]-AND SO MUCH MORE!![/I]
All bee types come with associated "Beesearch," allowing players to discover how to make these bees!
(C) 2007-2025 AD TURTLESHROOM PRODUCTIONS JESUS LOVES YOU AND DIED FOR YOU RANDY RANDOM DID NOTHING WRONG
(NO JUSTIN BEE-BERS WERE HARMED IN THE MAKING OF B. DIDDY)
* = When counting bees that only appear with Mods...
